item.title: [DERBY-2598] new upgrade test failures after change 528033
item.description:

item.summary: new upgrade test failures after change 528033

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
change 525521 fixes this problem. It was only a problem with new trunk code for collation support.

Fixes upgrade bug in writeExternal of Heap, it was writing the wrong
conglomerate format id in the case of a hard upgrade accessing an
existing Heap from an old database. It was writing out the hardcoded
new format
id when it should have been writing out the dynamic one in the class's
state.
